thread.title: Kim Kardashian Says She and Kendall Made Lamar Odom Smile in Hospital
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Says She and Kendall Made Lamar Odom Smile in Hospital

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kim Kardashian Says She and Kendall Made Lamar Odom Smile in Hospital
text:
Comments The pregnant sister of Khloe Kardashian tells her brother-in-law to keep fighting as she says, 'I have faith in you.' 
Kim Kardashian breaks her silence after her brother-in-law, Lamar Odom , woke up from coma. The pregnant reality TV star posted on Instagram a throwback picture of her dancing with the basketball player. "I have faith in you," the E! star wrote in a caption. "I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers!" She added, "Lammy- I'm so happy Kendall &I could make you smile today! God is good!" A photo posted by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Oct 17, 2015 at 9:44pm PDT Momager Kris Jenner also returned to the social media with an older picture of her family and the NBA star. "Come on Lamar!!!! You are such a champion... I know you got this.... #ourfighter #pleasepray #love #thatsmileiseverything," she wrote. A photo posted by @krisjenner on Oct 17, 2015 at 9:07pm PDT Lamar Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel. Cocaine and opiates were reportedly found in his system. Khloe Kardashian , who has split from the athlete but is still legally married to him, has been keeping vigil at his bedside in the hospital. While he was still coma, the Kardashians stopped all updates on their paid-for app to support Khloe. Kim also postponed her baby shower to be with her sister at the hospital. Now that the athlete is out of coma, the family is gradually back to work. Kylie Jenner was recently spotted in Los Angeles filming a music video with her rapper boyfriend Tyga . They were seen wearing matching varsity jackets. She had a "K" on her outfit and her beau had had a "T" on his.
